channel.title: Adding a scroll bar to an interface?
channel.description:
I was wondering how to add a scroll bar to my emote interface. It currently looks like this:
[IMG]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/7498/emoteinterface.png[/img]
- Refactored base client. - 317 client.
Anything else you need to know, just ask. Help is very much appreciated.

item.title: Adding a scroll bar to an interface?
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Yes, I made this myself. No, I’m not giving you the code. Add it in class9.java if you find out how. Still need help on adding the scroll bar, though. If anyone can help me on this, I’d really appreciate it.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a scroll bar to an interface?
